articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
From the mountains of Colombia to the hills of China, we'd like to introduce you to some new strains that will expand your global palate. Genetics from the U.K. contributed to the birth of OG Cheese and Cheesewreck, two potent hybrids that deliver jarring euphoria with that unmistakable sour smell from Cheese. Colombian Gold is a classic sativa landrace strain from South America, and China Yunnan was bred using native genetics from southern China. Last, we've added Schrom, a sativa-dominant strain from the U.S. that fills the room with a pungent lemon and lime aroma.
Are these strains in your corner of the world? Rate and review the ones you've tried, and let us know if they're worth seeking out!
   1. OG Cheese
Characteristics of OG Cheese:

Hybrid strain
Cross between OG Skunk #1 and Afghani
Sour cheese aroma
Presents a dreamy, euphoric buzz
Indoor flowering time of 50 to 60 days

   2. Colombian Gold
Characteristics of Colombian Gold:

Sativa landrace strain
From the Santa Marta mountains of Colombia
Sweet, skunky, lemon, and lime aroma
Delivers active, uplifting, focused effects
May help with muscle tension, pain, depression, and ADD/ADHD

   3. Kali China
Characteristics of Kali China:

75% indica
Cross between Kali Mist and China Yunnan
Breeder: ACE Seeds
Sweet mango and earthy spice aroma
Is relaxing but stimulating enough for conversation and focus
Indoor flowering time of 45 to 55 days

   4. Cheesewreck
Characteristics of Cheesewreck:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cheese and Trainwreck
Breeder: Seedism Seeds
Pungent cheese aroma
Brings heavy euphoria and full-body relaxation
Indoor flowering time of 9 to 10 weeks

   5. Schrom
Characteristics of Schrom:

70% sativa
Cross between Romulan and Silver Haze
Lemon and lime aroma
Clear-headed and functional, then fades to relaxation
articles.title: New Strains Alert: OG Cheese, Colombian Gold, Kali China, Cheesewreck, and Schrom

description: Kali China, bred by Ace Seeds, is a 75% indica strain that combines an uplifting Kali Mist with the potent China Yunnan. This strain inherits stimulating and engaging effects from its sativa parent along with a short flowering time from the China Yunnan indica. Aromas of sweet mango intermix with earthy notes of hash and spice in an intricate flavor profile. Kali China’s effects command relaxation, but leave the mind nimble enough for conversation and focus. When grown indoors, Kali China finishes flowering after 45 to 55 days while outdoor gardens complete their bloom during the September-October transition.
descriptionPlain: Kali China, bred by Ace Seeds, is a 75% indica strain that combines an uplifting Kali Mist with the potent China Yunnan. This strain inherits stimulating and engaging effects from its sativa parent along with a short flowering time from the China Yunnan indica. Aromas of sweet mango intermix with earthy notes of hash and spice in an intricate flavor profile. Kali China’s effects command relaxation, but leave the mind nimble enough for conversation and focus. When grown indoors, Kali China finishes flowering after 45 to 55 days while outdoor gardens complete their bloom during the September-October transition.

highlightedReviews.text: Not a sleepy indica, but a relaxing yet uplifting high. Very clear and tasty as well!! 😎
Very tasty, minty/spicy sweet mango. Effects are functional and a little trippy but very chill. An indica with less heavy/laziness.  Great for going on hikes or walks in nature.

name: Kali China
